synopsis.text:
Goro Taniguchi, the creative mastermind behind "Code Geass" and "One Piece Film Red," presents a captivating three-part anime anthology series, "Enter The Garden." This collaborative project between Dentsu Inc. and Chiru Labs, the creative force behind the globally-acclaimed NFT project Azukiâ„¢, is set to launch throughout the year.

In the first episode, "The Waiting Man," we meet Haru, a rebellious skater who constantly grapples with societal norms and expectations. Feeling like an outsider in her own world, Haru's life takes an unexpected turn when she encounters a mysterious man named T.K. sitting beside a vending machine. T.K. appears to be waiting for someone, and his enigmatic presence piques Haru's curiosity, setting the stage for a thrilling journey of self-discovery and adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
